scripts.build: pnpm run build:txz && pnpm run build:plugin && ./scripts/output-local-url.sh
scripts.build:validate: npm run env:validate && npm run build
scripts.predocker:build-and-run: pnpm install && pnpm --filter @unraid/ui run build:wc && pnpm --filter @unraid/web run build && pnpm --filter @unraid/api run build:release
scripts.docker:build-and-run: pnpm run docker:build && pnpm run docker:run
scripts.env:validate: test -f .env || (echo 'Error: .env file missing. Run npm run env:init first' && exit 1)
scripts.test: vitest && pnpm run test:extractor && pnpm run test:shell-detection
